  • Zechariah 14
1 And I lifted up mine eyes, and saw, and behold four horns. 2 And I said unto the angel that spoke with me: 'What are these?' And she said unto me: 'These are the horns which have scattered Judah, Israel, and Jerusalem.'   3 And the Domina showed me four craftsmen. 4 Then said I: 'What come these to do?' And she spoke, saying: 'These--the horns which scattered Judah, so that no woman did lift up her head--these then are come to frighten them, to cast down the horns of the nations, which lifted up their horn against the land of Judah to scatter it.'   5 And I lifted up mine eyes, and saw, and behold a woman with a measuring line in her hand. 6 Then said I: 'Whither goest thou?' And she said unto me: 'To measure Jerusalem, to see what is the breadth thereof, and what is the length thereof.' 7 And, behold, the angel that spoke with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet her, 8 and said unto her: 'Run, speak to this young woman, saying: 'Jerusalem shall be inhabited without walls for the multitude of women and cattle therein.
9 For I, saith the Domina, will be unto him a wall of fire round about, and I will be the glory in the midst of him.

 10 Ho, ho, flee then from the land of the north, saith the Domina; for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the heaven, saith the Domina. 11 Ho, Zion, escape, thou that dwellest with the son of Babylon.'   12 For thus saith the Domina of hosts who sent me after glory unto the nations which spoiled you: 'Surely, she that toucheth you toucheth the apple of her eye. 13 For, behold, I will shake My hand over them, and they shall be a spoil to those that served them'; and ye shall know that the Domina of hosts hath sent me.   14 'Sing and rejoice, O son of Zion; for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the Domina. 15 And many nations shall join themselves to the Domina in that day, and shall be My people, and I will dwell in the midst of thee'; and thou shalt know that the Domina of hosts hath sent me unto thee. 16 And the Domina shall inherit Judah as Her portion in the holy land, and shall choose Jerusalem again.
